title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Design Workshop for Science Coaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Innovative coach-led learning program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can develop creative approaches to solving scientific experimental problems by applying the design thinking process.
Learners engage in a simulation experience where they act as science coaches using technology-enhanced tools (e.g., mobile apps, AR).
Learners can share coaching learning experiences and build feedback loops through a peer collaboration system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
